title: 03 bedroom apartment for sale in Summer Empire
details:
Brand new, beautiful apartment for sale in the heart of Wellawatte with a panoramic view of the city, surrounded by calm & peaceful neighborhood.
Banks, schools, hospitals, eateries & public transportation all located within close proximity.

Consists of :-

- 03 bedrooms
- 02 bathrooms
- 1300 sqft
- Secured Parking
- 24 hours Security
- Gym

Ideal for single family

Further inquiries please contact Linea Property.

Ref Id :- LPAS125
